questions.question: I want you to help …………………………… with my homework.
questions.description: A pronoun used as the object should be in its object form.

questions.question: She said that she couldn’t do anything to help …………………………..
questions.description: A pronoun used as the object should be in its object form.

questions.question: We are all waiting for …………………………….
questions.description: A pronoun used as the object of a preposition should be in the object form. The subject and object form of you are the same - you.

questions.question: That cat of …………………………… has scratched me again.
He is a friend of ……………………………..
questions.description: The possessive form is used after the preposition in this structure.

questions.question: One of …………………………….. friends is a sailor.
questions.description: The possessive form of the pronoun can be used as an adjective to modify nouns.

questions.question: None of ………………………………. can do anything about it.
questions.description: The object of a preposition should be in its object form.

questions.question: Between you and ………………………………. I don’t trust him.
questions.description: The object is a preposition should be in its form.

questions.question: He earns more than ……………………………… do.
questions.description: The subject pronoun is used before a verb.

questions.question: She blamed …………………………….. for the mistake.
questions.description: Either herself or him can be used here with different meanings.
